data.name: Victory Heat Rally Demo
data.detailed_description:
Drivers! Are you ready for the Shakedown?

What is a shakedown we hear you ask? A shakedown is the opportunity for crews to test their competition cars on terrain similar to the rally before the actual event starts. Competitors must drive through the shakedown stage at least three times, with all passes timed. Are you ready for the challenge?

The Victory Heat Rally Shakedown demo has 2 main types of races: Circuit and Rally mode!

Circuit Mode
Circuit races take place on looping tracks, with each race containing multiple laps against rival drivers all on the road at once.

Rally Mode
Rally stages on the other hand, take place on non-looping point to point style tracks. Rally stages demand higher intensity driving as you race to finish to get the fastest time possible.

Head on over to the track, because It's time to start your engines!

data.short_description: Giving retro a fresh lick of paint, Victory Heat Rally Shakedown demo is set to burn rubber on the track. Are your engines ready?

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i7 @ 2.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
